duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide critical support in driving sales and distribution growth for Tier 2 Master Agents.
Develop and strengthen relationships with Master Agents, translating feedback internally.
Identify opportunities and lead account strategy and planning discussions with Master Agents.
Drive and influence Master Agent distribution growth strategy for retail.
Produce and present creative, compelling proposals, presentations, and business reviews that express Total by Verizon's key initiatives and expectations.
Assess performance of each agent and retailer, and develop tailored plans to improve productivity.
Measure and monitor KPIs for respective Indirect Partners, and execute plans to meet and exceed sales targets.
Establish credibility with principals and effectively balance the needs of all involved in negotiations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience (MBA or M.S. in related fields preferred)
